alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 05 at 3:22AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Sea Levels Sunday Night Through Tuesday... Water levels continue to rise along the Arctic Coast from Utqiagvik west. The highest water levels are expected to occur Monday Night and Tuesday morning. Water may push up on top of the sea ice, and could cause ice to pile up on beaches from Utqiagvik west. No infrastructure flooding is expected at this time. Residents with belongings along the coast should move items inland from the beach. A series of strong storms moving north over the Bering and Chukchi Seas through early next week will bring strong southerly winds across the Bering and Chukchi Seas. The strong southerly winds will bring elevated sea levels from Utqiagvik west through Tuesday.

area.areaDesc: Northern Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast
